body_html:
@erickrf Thank you for your reply. But I remember you said without other operations, you just run
"
import tensorflow as tf
sess = tf.InteractiveSession()
"
It would give you an error of "
Total memory: 11.25GiB
Free memory: 11.16GiB
Segmentation fault (core dumped)"
I have the same problem and am a little confused about this.

body:
@erickrf  Thank you for your reply. But I remember you said without other operations, you just run 
" 
import tensorflow as tf
sess = tf.InteractiveSession()
"
It would give you an error of "
Total memory: 11.25GiB
Free memory: 11.16GiB
Segmentation fault (core dumped)"
I have the same problem and am a little confused about this.
